sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) has argued, for instance, that you actually have a constitutionally protected right to free, unrestricted travel within the United States,? which would prevent airlines from requiring passengers to be vaccinated against the coronavirus.
title: Opinion: A party that censures its defenders of the Constitution has lost its way

Josh Hawley and Reps. Madison Cawthorn, Lauren Boebert, and Paul Gosar ascending to prominence.
